text: Radio Capital is a radio station based in Dhaka, Bangladesh. Bangladeshi journalist, Naem Nizam, is the CEO of the Radio Capital. ==History== Radio Capital was established on November 2015 as a company of East West Media Group a concern of Bashundhara Group. It broadcasts on 94.8 FM. The Radio also broadcasts online. ==Special Capital program== *Valobasha with Guru Ehtesham (every Thursday night from 11.00 PM) *Love Guru Ehtesham (prime host) *RJ Anee (co-host) *Intejar Haque (program producer) ==References== Category:2015 establishments in Bangladesh Category:Organisations based in Dhaka Category:Radio stations in Bangladesh Category:Mass media in Dhaka
title: Radio Capital (Dhaka)
